TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventIgnoreAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies a property should be ignored when writing an event type with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> method is called, all of an objectâ€™s public properties are written to the event payload. Apply EventIgnoreAttribute to a property to prevent the property from being written in the event.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventIgnoreAttribute"> class.
